posts.post_title: FS: Large Lot of Low/Mid-Grade T205's w/ HOF's and SP's **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T205 lot available for sale. Condition should be accurately reflected by the scans but please feel free to ask any questions. Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. 3 or more ship for free. Payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

Austin - $22
Crandall ("t" not crossed) PSA 1 - $30
Doyle - $17
Elberfeld - $22
Hoblitzel (name incorrect, no Cin) - $70
Mattern - $16
H. McIntire - $18
Oldring - $15
Olmstead - $18
Overall - $22
Reulbach - $16
Richie - $20
One bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!

Thanks Marc for another flawless transaction.  Cards arrived yesterday.

r/
Frank
I agree...smooth transaction as usual. Thanks again!
